str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Abraham, progenitor of the Hebrew race. Of Hebrew origin; Abraham, the Hebrew patriarch.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
A child, descendent, inhabitant. From the base of timoria; a child.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To remember, call to mind, recall, mention. A prolonged form of mnaomai; to remind, i.e. to recall to mind.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Life, both of physical (present) and of spiritual (particularly future) existence. From zao; life.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From apo and lambano; to receive; also to take aside.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A primary word; 'good'.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
And, even, also, namely.
Probably of Hebrew origin; Lazarus, the name of two Israelites.
In like manner, similarly, in the same way, equally. Adverb from homoios; similarly.
Bad, evil, in the widest sense. Apparently a primary word; worthless, i.e. depraved, or injurious.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From para and kaleo; to call near, i.e. Invite, invoke.
From an adverb form of hode; in this same spot, i.e. Here or hither.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To torment, pain; mid. and pass: To be tormented, pained; I suffer acute pain, physical or mental. From odune; to grieve.
